1: bar byed <mistake>pa'o// 'jigs</mistake> pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed <mistake>pa'o// rmi</mistake> lam <mistake>da</mistake> pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed <mistake>pa'o // mtshan</mistake> ma <mistake>dsn pa</mistake> <mistake>thams</mistake> cad rnam par sel bar byed <mistake>pa'o//ltas</mistake> <mistake>ndan</mistake>
2: pa <mistake>dang</mistake> bgegs thams cad <mistake>te</mistake> bar zhi bar byed <mistake>pa'o //bdud</mistake> kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed <mistake>pa'o//dge</mistake> ba'i <mistake>rta</mistake> ba <mistake>deng</mistake> <mistake>bsod</mistake> <mistake>rnams</mistake> thams cad <mistake>nye</mistake> <mistake>basr</mistake> 'phel bar byed <mistake>pa 'o // tshul</mistake> <mistake>bzhid</mistake> ma
3: yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o // rgyags pa dang <mistake>ng</mistake> rgyal dang dregs <mistake>pa</mistake> dang <mistake>nar</mistake> 'dzin <mistake>pha</mistake> thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o // sdug <mistake>bsngal</mistake> dang yid mi bde ba thams cad
4: mi skye bar byed <mistake>pa'o//de</mistake> bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur <mistake>pa'o// byang</mistake> <mistake>chu b</mistake> <mistake>stems</mistake> dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur <mistake>la'o//nyan</mistake> <mistake>tos</mistake> dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen
5: du gyur <mistake>pa'o//phyag</mistake> rgya dang <mistake>sngags</mistake> thams cad du <mistake>gyur</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//chos</mistake> thams cad brjod <mistake>du</mistake> med <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>sra</mistake> ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed <mistake>pa'o//bla</mistake> na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs
6: par byed <mistake>pa'o//nad</mistake> med pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o // dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba <mistake>dang/lags</mistake> pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o // grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su
7: <mistake>hcad</mistake> pa dang bstod <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>rab</mistake> tu gsal bar byed <mistake>pa'o//nad</mistake> dang 'jigs pa chen po <mistake>tams</mistake> cad <mistake>ne</mistake> bar zhi bar byed <mistake>pga'o//shin</mistake> du dag pa rnams kyi shin <mistake>tu</mistake> dag <mistake>pa'o//shin</mistake> du <mistake>gtsad</mistake> ba rnams kyi shin du <mistake>gtsang</mistake>
8: <mistake>/ba'o//shin</mistake> tu 'byor ldan rnams kyi shin du 'byor ldan <mistake>no//shin</mistake> du bkra shis pa rnams kyi <mistake>shin</mistake> du bkra shis pa'o // skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs <mistake>so// gnas</mistake> <mistake>mada</mistake> pa rnams kyi gnas <mistake>so/</mistake>
